name: axo-discode
description:
A Visual Studio Code extension that displays the projects you're working in, on your Discord profile.

Yeah, I know: not new. Shut up.

markdownEnumDescriptions: The lowest level and _most verbose_ output.
Get a deeper insight into the extension's execution.
Simple information about the extension's runtime.
Any warnings displayed by the extension that prevent proper execution.
**Recoverable** errors that result in _part_ of the extension not working correctly.
**Unrecoverable** errors that result in the extension not being able to run _at all._

discode.idleTimeout.markdownDescription: Specifies the number of seconds to wait before updating the RPC to an idle screen.

discode.includeWatermark.markdownDescription:
Whether or not to include a button that links back to this extension.

_If you opt not to have this enabled, you can share this project by word of mouth. Thank you._

discode.promptOnNewRelease.markdownDescription: Whether or not to prompt the user on startup when a new version of this extension is discovered.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
